name: Showcase Presents "Elongated Man" Quiz | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which other hero does Elongated Man help defeat Chronos?
questions.explanation:
The Atom.

	The Atom is Ray Palmer, a scientist who can shrink himself down to tiny sizes. He was tripped in a rigged clock that would blow up if he tried to set himself free, but Elongated Man defused the bomb using his ductile fingers!

questions.text: Batman and Robin team up with Elongated Man to take down a deposed Nazi general. What is his name?
questions.explanation:
General von Dort.

	General von Dort was reported to have died along with Adolf Hitler, but the reports were greatly exaggerated. He was helping criminals attack with military efficiency.

questions.text: Who was the best man at Elongated Man's wedding?
questions.explanation:
The Flash.

	Barry Allen, the second person to bear the name of Flash, served as Elongated Man's best man for his wedding to Sue Dearbon. Ralph and Sue would tour the USA, solving mysteries along the way.

questions.text: In order to find an old Native American treasure, what color horse had to be present?
questions.explanation:
Purple.

	Purple is also the Elongated Man's favorite color, and was the primary color to his first outfit! According to an old Native American poem, only someone with a purple horse and a girl in tow could find the treasure.

questions.text: Elongated Man recieved a new costume for a birthday present from his wife Sue.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Where the first costume was purple, this one was red and yellow, and was the costume Elongated Man wore during Identity Crisis. It is similar to the costume of another stretchable superhero, Plastic Man.

questions.text: In one story, Sue Dibny was kidnapped by aliens.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Replaced with a duplicate, Elongated Man solved the mystery when he noticed that the fake Sue was pale, whereas the real Sue had a tan.

questions.text: When Elongated Man senses a mystery, his ear twitches.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Elongated Man's nose twitches, not his ear. When this occurs, Sue resigns herself to another vacation spent alone as Ralph catches crooks.

questions.text: Approximately how far can Elongated Man stretch?
questions.explanation:
One hundred yards.

	Elongated Man mentions this fact when he is pushed off the Eiffel Tower and stretches his arm to grab onto the ledge. This occured during yet another story where Ralph's wife Sue had been abducted.

questions.text: In "The Man Who Hated Money", how many people were involved in the hoax?
questions.explanation:
Four.

	A disc jockey named Flip Philips made up the story of a robber who steals money only to tear it up simply to promote his new song. Actress Rhoda Marr and her onstage partner August Clemens also went along with the scheme. Lastly, an artist reported being robbed to gain fame for his art show.

Sue Dibny.

	Sue Dibny mysteriously gains what seem to be magical powers, but are simply clever manipulations of an evil-minded hotel manager! He cashed in on the idea that the room the Dibnys were staying in was haunted.
